source.javadoc:
The result type of a {@link FileVisitor FileVisitor}.
1.7
Files#walkFileTree
Continue. When returned from a {@link FileVisitor#preVisitDirectorypreVisitDirectory} method then the entries in the directory should also be visited.

Continue without visiting the entries in this directory. This result is only meaningful when returned from the {@link FileVisitor#preVisitDirectory preVisitDirectory} method; otherwise this result type is the same as returning {@link #CONTINUE}.

Continue without visiting the siblings of this file or directory. If returned from the {@link FileVisitor#preVisitDirectorypreVisitDirectory} method then the entries in the directory are also skipped and the {@link FileVisitor#postVisitDirectory postVisitDirectory}method is not invoked.
